output_list.description: The vulnerability exists in the distribute function, allowing an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
Integer overflow in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`.
Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.
Relies on outdated constructor naming conventions prone to typos.
Integer overflow in the line `totalBounty -= _value;`, allowing an attacker to set an arbitrary user's balance to any value.
The distribute function allows an attacker to claim ownership and funds.
